data.eml:eml: Adinopsis nippon, a new species of marsh-dwelling rove beetle (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae: Deinopsini) from Japan, with an annotated catalogue of Adinopsis species of the world

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Maruyama, Munetoshi, Kamezawa, Hiromu (2013): Adinopsis nippon, a new species of marsh-dwelling rove beetle (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae: Deinopsini) from Japan, with an annotated catalogue of Adinopsis species of the world. Zootaxa 3669 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3669.1.8
